references.paper_title: Image quality assessment: from error visibility to structural similarity
references.reason: This paper is foundational to image quality assessment, a key component in evaluating the performance of watermarking methods.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a fundamental model used in the proposed watermarking method, thus directly shaping its design and functionality.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper highlights the power of diffusion models in image generation, providing critical context for the paper's focus on diffusion-based watermarking.

references.paper_title: Robust invisible video watermarking with attention
references.reason: This paper is among the most relevant prior work on robust watermarking, providing essential background and a benchmark for comparison.

references.paper_title: Generative autoencoders as watermark attackers: Analyses of vulnerabilities and threats
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the vulnerabilities of existing watermarking techniques to generative model attacks, motivating the need for a more robust approach.
